definitions.definition: A light covering with a sprinkled substance.
definitions.example: He decorated the Christmas card with a sprinkle of glitter.

definitions.definition: An aspersorium or utensil for sprinkling.
To cause (a substance) to fall in fine drops (for a liquid substance) or small pieces (for a solid substance).
definitions.example: The confectioner sprinkled icing sugar over the cakes.

definitions.definition: To cover (an object) by sprinkling a substance on to it.
definitions.example: The confectioner sprinkled the cakes with icing sugar.

definitions.definition: To drip in fine drops, sometimes sporadically.
definitions.example: It sprinkled outside all day long.
It sprinkled very early in the morning.

definitions.definition: To baptize by the application of a few drops, or a small quantity, of water; hence, to cleanse; to purify.
